model.utilities

Class ImageUtil

  • java.lang.Object
    • model.utilities.ImageUtil

  • public class ImageUtil
extends java.lang.Object
    This class contains utility methods to read an image from file and write to a file.

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      ImageUtil()

      Convenience function to get the width of an image.

    • Method Detail

      • readImage

        public static int[][][] readImage(java.lang.String filename)
                           throws java.io.IOException
        Read an image file and return the contents as an array.
        Parameters:
        filename - the path of the file. Look at the ImageIO documentation to see which file formats are supported.
        Returns:
        the image as a 3D array of integer values
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException

      • getWidth

        public static int getWidth(java.lang.String filename)
                    throws java.io.IOException
        Convenience function to get the width of an image.
        Parameters:
        filename - the full path of the image file. Look at the ImageIO class to see which file formats are supported
        Returns:
        the width of the file
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException - if the file is not found

      • getHeight

        public static int getHeight(java.lang.String filename)
                     throws java.io.IOException
        Convenience function to get the height of an image.
        Parameters:
        filename - the full path of the image file. Look at the ImageIO class to see which file formats are supported
        Returns:
        the height of the file
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException - if the file is not found

      • writeImage

        public static void writeImage(int[][][] rgb,
                              int width,
                              int height,
                              java.lang.String filename)
                       throws java.io.IOException
        Write an image to a file in a given format.
        Parameters:
        rgb - the image data as a 3D array of integers. The dimensions are row, col and channel respectively
        width - the width of the image
        height - the height of the image
        filename - the full path of where the image must be stored. This should include the name and extension of the file
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException - if the file cannot be written to the provided path

      • arrayToImage

        public static java.awt.image.BufferedImage arrayToImage(int[][][] rgb,
                                                        int width,
                                                        int height)
        Convert a 3D array of image pixels to a BufferedImage. Useful for writing images to files or adding images to a JLabel.
        Parameters:
        rgb - the image data as a 3D array of integers. The dimensions are row, col and channel respectively.
        width - the width of the image.
        height - the height of the image.
        Returns:
        a BufferedImage version of the array.
